title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app CC-1
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app CC-1

State Regulations
SPONSOR DATA FORM
IDENTIFICATION
PROJECT NUMBER (SLEOC filing)
PROJECT SPONSOR (name and address)
PROJECT CONTACT (name and address)
PROJECT ARCHITECT (name and address)
PROJECT ENGINEER (name and address)
PROJECT PLANNER (name and address)
PROJECT LANDSCAPE ARCHITECT (name and address)
PROJECT OTHER (name and address and scope of work)
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
LOCATION
TYPE (land use)
BUILDING SIZE (sq. ft.)
UNITS (# dwelling units or sq. ft.)
STORIES (number)
HEIGHT (feet from grade)
NUMBER OF BUILDINGS
BUILDING COVERAGE (% of site)
ON SITE PARKING (covered)
GRADING (% regraded)
VISIBILITY (from Lake or River)
SCHEDULE
PRELIMINARY PLANS (completed date)
FINAL PLANS (completed date)
SITE PREPARATION (starting date)
CONSTRUCTION (starting date)
OPERATION (occupancy date)
FUTURE COMPONENTS (type and date)
LOCAL APPROVALS
PLANNING BOARD
ZONING BOARD
BUILDING DEPARTMENT
HEALTH AGENCY
PUBLIC AGENCY ASSISTANCE OR REVIEW
PROGRAM TYPE (aid requested or review and name)
FEDERAL (list names)
STATE (list names)
COUNTY (list names)
LOCAL (list names)
PROJECT STATUS (date submitted and action)
COST AND FINANCING
LAND VALUE (at day of filing)
CONSTRUCTION (total)
VALUE OF IMPROVEMENTS (total)
PRIVATE FINANCING (%)
TYPE OF PUBLIC FINANCING (program)
AMOUNT OF PUBLIC FUNDS (total)
RELOCATION
FAMILIES TO BE DISPLACED (number)
RELOCATION PLANS (status)
DRAWINGS AND MAPS REQUIRED
VICINITY MAP
project location
adjacent properties and land uses
access
utility lines
EXISTING SITE FEATURES
boundary lines
existing contours
trees and other vegetation
water bodies and drainage courses
structures
roads
other significant features
SITE DESCRIPTION
SITE SIZE (acres or sq. ft.)
EXISTING USE (land use class)
EXISTING ZONING (classification)
EXISTING BUILDNGS (number and type)
EXISTING ROADS (paved surface type)
EXISTING STRUCTURES (number and type)
LANDFORM (dominant)
VEGETATION (dominant)
SURROUNDING AREA
character
land use
zoning
building condition
SERVICES
ROAD ACCESS yes/no
RAIL ACCESS yes/no
RIVER ACCESS yes/no
WATER yes/no
GAS yes/no
SEWER yes/no and functional capacity
ELECTRICITY yes/no
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION yes/no
EMPLOYMENT
PERMANENT EMPLOYEES (full and part time)
LABOR SHED (communities)
PROJECT SITE PLAN
boundary lines
building locations and uses
final grades
final contours
drainage
planting
sidewalks and paths
roads and paved areas
PROJECT SITE PLAN (Continued)
walls and fences
service areas
utility lines
soil boring locations and logs
cross sections, profiles and details of landscaping
BUILDING DRAWINGS
plans
elevations
sections
details
model
rendering (perspective)
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
FEASIBILITY STUDY
MARKET STUDY
PROJECT REPORT
ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT STATEMENT
COMPREHENSIVE PLANNING REPORT
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app
CC-1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
